article: students who participated in the first year of the district of columbia 's federally financed school voucher program did not show significantly higher math or reading achievement , but their parents were satisfied anyway , viewing the private schools they attended at taxpayer expense as safer and better than public schools , according to an education department study released thursday .
abstract: voucher use in washington wins praise of parents
